COM.sootNsmoke.scheme
Class Reader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--COM.sootNsmoke.scheme.Reader
public class Reader
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a reader for the scheme package. Instantiate this class with the input stream you want to read. Then each call to readExpr will return the next Scheme expression from the input stream.

Field Detail

eof

public static final java.lang.Object eof
Method Detail

readExpr

public java.lang.Object readExpr()
                          throws SchemeException,
                                 java.io.IOException
Returns the next scheme form from the input stream. It returns: 
     #t         -> Boolean.TRUE
     #f         -> Boolean.FALSE
     #\\space   -> ' '  (as a Character)
     #\\newline -> '\n' (as a Character)
     #\\c       -> c    (as a Character)
     #(...)     -> a Vector
     number     -> a Number
     'x         -> Cons("quote", x)
     `x         -> Cons("quasiquote", x)
     ,@x        -> Cons("unquote-splicing", x)
     ,x         -> Cons("unquote", x)
     "..."      -> a String
     ...        -> a Symbol

isValidSymbol

public boolean isValidSymbol(java.lang.String s)
Recognizes valid Scheme symbols. Syntax: identifer -> * | -> a | b | ... | z | ! | $ | % | & | * | / | : | < | = | > | ? | ~ | _ | ^ -> | 0 | 1 | ... | 9 | . | + | - -> + | - | ...
